body:
A THCStream* is actually a CUDAStreamInternal* (the THCStream header has the typedef). 

It is a little confusing that one has to retain a CUDAStreamInternal before wrapping it in a CUDAStream. While you're updating the the API you may want to add a function like CUDAStream_wrap(CUDAStreamInternals*) that retains for you and returns the CUDAStream. Unfortunately I don't think we can change CUDAStream() to automatically retain because of the way the pointer API works (and the pointer API is not just for legacy support).
